Transcription-Unit.comment: Based on the improved computational program DTI (Direct Information criterion), which is an extension of the concept of MI that allows investigators to measure the direction of information flow between two random variables, and DTInfer, a new R-package for the inference of gene regulatory networks from microarrays based on directed information, the ycaO gene was identified as a new target of Fis [Kaleta10].

Evidence-Code.comment: Automated inference. A computer inferred this assertion through one of many possible methods such as sequence similarity, recognized motifs or consensus sequence, etc. When a person made the inference from computational evidence, use EV-COMP-HINF.
